wikipedia_page.main: Waide Simon Fairhurst (born 7 May 1989) is an English professional footballer who plays for Barton Town.

response: With his first team opportunities limited at Morecambe, Sampson joined Macclesfield Town on loan until the end of the season. Two days after signing for Macclesfield Town, Sampson the made his Macclesfield Town debut, coming on as a substitute for Waide Fairhurst in the 84th minute, in a 0–0 draw against Bristol Rovers. Sampson scored his first goals in the next game, in a 2–2 draw against Halifax Town on 3 April 2015. After making four appearances and scoring  times, Sampson returned to his parent club and was released by the club at the end of the 2014–15 season.
